title: Integrate translate in the firefox for desktop
content:
Hello. Is it possible to add a built-in website translator for different languages ​​like in google chrome. It would be nice.

Thanks.

title: Erro no Jogo FarmVille2 Tropic Escape (RunTimeError - JavaScript)

title: Voice on Discord app breaks up when Firefox is opened
content: Idk if it could be a firefox or discord issue: Using the latest stable FIREFOX on my Ubuntu budgie 20.04 LTS and when firefox is opened, it breaks voice on discord app when talking to friends and navigating though pages. I tried already to change the settings at PERFORMANCE (to enable the harware acceleration). I`m reporting this to discord as well. Thx
creator: mavask71

title: Is Chromebook Firefox 64 bit?
content: Is Chromebook Firefox 64 bit? I cannot find any specification for any Firefox OS. Is there a support page with this information? Thank you for your help? Burt
